Hello everyone,

My name is Ping Wang. I am a PhD student majoring Computer=
 Science at
University of Central Florida. I am participating Google Summer=
 of
Code 2008. The project I am working on is "Web Spam Detection for
Herit=
rix", and my mentor is Gordon Mohr. The abstract of this project
can be fou=
nd here
http://code.google.com/soc/2008/intarch/appinfo.html?csaid=3DF6D044=
FD6B4943FF.
I will establish a public web page for this project where I can=
 put
detailed information and updates on the project. I will let you guys
k=
now when the web page is ready.

This is the first time that I am involved =
in open source software
development. It would be a great experience. There =
are so many things
I need to learn. This summer would be busy and fun!

Que=
stions, comments and suggestions are welcome.

Cheers,
-Ping Wang
